description: Path Traversal vulnerability in Photo Station versions: 5.7.2 and earlier in QTS 4.3.4, 5.4.4 and earlier in QTS 4.3.3, 5.2.8 and earlier in QTS 4.2.6 could allow remote attackers to access sensitive information on the device.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Photo Station versions: 5.7.2 and earlier in QTS 4.3.4, 5.4.4 and earlier in QTS 4.3.3, 5.2.8 and earlier in QTS 4.2.6
